sentences.sContent: He's multi-lingual. Angel is a speaker of English, Russian, Arab and French. And love.
sentences.sContent_eng: He's multi-lingual. Angel is a speaker of English, Russian, Arab and French. And love.
sentences.sCn: 安吉尔说多种语言：英语、俄语、阿拉伯语和法语，当然他也懂爱的语言。

sentences.sContent: Chat with your friends during game play - multiple lingual support for chat text (even user names support all languages)!
sentences.sContent_eng: Chat with your friends during game play - multiple lingual support for chat text (even user names support all languages)!
sentences.sCn: 在游戏期间和您的朋友聊天——聊天信息支持多种语言（用户名也支持所有语言）！

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the tongue or a part or structure resembling a tongue
